skills.name: Elemental Wisdom
skills.description: Buff - Your spells and attacks ignore a fraction of enemy resistance.

skills.name: Veneration of Justice
skills.description: Buff - Increases vitality, energy and weapon damage.

skills.name: Spark of Hope
skills.description: Buff - Temporarily raises all character speeds.

skills.name: Ward of Fate
skills.description: Buff - Protect yourself with a glowing shield.

skills.name: Valiance
skills.description: Upgrade - Increase your movement speed.

skills.name: Servants of Valor
skills.description: Summon - A zealous coven of followers shows no mercy to the enemy.

skills.name: Conclave
skills.description: Upgrade - Empowers your servants of valor.

skills.name: Fervor
skills.description: Upgrade - Empowers your servants of valor.

skills.name: Retaliate
skills.description: Attack - Strike back with a vengeance.

skills.name: Divine Judgement
skills.description: Attack - Invoke a cascade of heavenly power to purify evil.

skills.name: Sanctity
skills.description: Passive - Abandon the physical to increase elemental prowess.

skills.name: Consecration
skills.description: Passive - Turn from holy flames and embrace the realm of the physical.

skills.name: Lionheart
skills.description: Buff - Increases offensive and defensive power.

skills.name: Holy Fire
skills.description: Passive - Endows the weapons of the honorable with blessed light.

skills.name: Colosseum
skills.description: Warp Strike - Crash into an enemy target weakening foes within the impact zone.

skills.name: Dragon Jaws
skills.description: Spell - Shreds the target area with monstrous fangs.

skills.name: Solar Flare
skills.description: Spell - Burn and blind enemies in a large area around you.

skills.name: Dragonbone Armor
skills.description: Buff - Surrounds you with a protective barrier.

skills.name: Scion
skills.description: Passive - The power of the light strengthens you in combat.

skills.name: Apex Predator
skills.description: Upgrade - Command holy servants and sap the life from your enemies.

skills.name: Annihilation
skills.description: Spell - Summon fiery serpents to incinerate your foes.

skills.name: Dragon's Breath
skills.description: Debuff - Reduces enemy fire resistance and fire damage.

skills.name: Combustion
skills.description: Upgrade - Increases the offensive potency of Annihilation.

skills.name: Vessel of Retribution
skills.description: Spell - Periodically blasts nearby threats with divine magic.

skills.name: Vessel of Judgement
skills.description: Spell - Periodically assaults enemies with righteous blasts.

skills.name: Solstice and Equinox
skills.description: Upgrade - Increase damage and targets.

skills.name: Life and Death
skills.description: Upgrade - Increase damage and targets.

skills.name: Absolution
skills.description: Spell - Concentrate the power of your vessels to purge evil.

skills.name: Reverence
skills.description: Buff - Applies relevant effects from Ward of Fate and Veneration of Justice.

skills.name: Grim Presence
skills.description: Buff - Enemies near you are weaker.

skills.name: Lemures
skills.description: Melee Spell - Unleashes multiple homing ice wraiths.

skills.name: Rite of the Restless
skills.description: Upgrade - Increases Lemures damage but reduces its area of effect.

skills.name: Blood Thorns
skills.description: Melee Spell - Blasts enemies with burning thorns.

skills.name: Rite of Thorns
skills.description: Upgrade - Increases Blood Thorns damage but reduces its area of effect.

skills.name: Possession
skills.description: Passive - Improves your combat fortitude.

skills.name: Sanguine Covenant
skills.description: Buff - Blood ritual empowering your spells and restoring life.

skills.name: Frostbite
skills.description: Upgrade - Grim Presence adds cold damage to Divine Apparition.

skills.name: Transcendence
skills.description: Upgrade - Grim Presence adds fire pierce to your servants of valor.

skills.name: Mind Flay
skills.description: Spell - Chaotic beam of lightning that shocks your primary target.

skills.name: Confluence
skills.description: Upgrade - Mind Flay is stronger when you are healthy.

skills.name: Stormlord
skills.description: Passive - Bonus to strength, dexterity, vitality and energy.

skills.name: Slayer
skills.description: Spell - Summons a stationary phantom that electrocutes nearby enemies.

skills.name: Symphony of Destruction
skills.description: Upgrade - Your Mind Flay is enhanced near your Slayer.

skills.name: Tainted Blood
skills.description: Buff - Infuse your flesh with a dark prayer.

skills.name: Acumen
skills.description: Passive - Mastery over the dark arts improve your abilities.

skills.name: Meditation
skills.description: Passive - Increases your maximum mana and mana regeneration.

skills.name: Purity
skills.description: Passive - Protects you against poison damage and curses.

skills.name: Melee Devotion
skills.description: Passive - A melee exclusive layer of damage protection.

skills.name: Freedom
skills.description: Passive - Increases defensive speeds and reduces chilled duration.

skills.name: Tenacity
skills.description: Passive - Increases physical resistance.

skills.name: Endurance
skills.description: Passive - Increases your maximum life.

skills.name: Continuity
skills.description: Passive - Increases the duration of your buff/debuff skills.

skills.name: Specialization
skills.description: Passive - Increases the skill cap of your activate [Non-Ultimate] Abilities.

skills.name: Chemistry
skills.description: Passive - Increases potion effectiveness compared to other sustain.

skills.name: Divine Apparition
skills.description: Warp - Teleport to target location, freezing nearby monsters.

skills.name: Blessed Life
skills.description: Passive - Reduces all incoming physical damage.

skills.name: Dragon's Blessing
skills.description: Passive - The dragon gods increase your combat power.

skills.name: Resurrect
skills.description: Spell - Revive target corpses as powerful holy revenants.

skills.name: Superbeast
skills.description: Buff - Morph into a shadow beast, increasing damage.

skills.name: Habeas Corpus
skills.description: Spell - Spawn corpses of enemies you've resurrected last.

skills.name: Paragon of Fate
skills.description: Passive - High level bonuses tied to Heroic Library of Fate progression.

skills.name: Paragon of Sanctity
skills.description: Passive - High level bonuses tied to Heroic Duncraig progression.
